title: Guinea declares new Ebola epidemic, five years after West Africa’s deadliest outbreak
content:
1. Guinea declares new Ebola epidemic, five years after West Africa’s deadliest outbreak  Washington Post
  2. Guinea Declares Ebola Outbreak as Disease Returns to West Africa  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  3. New Ebola outbreak declared in Guinea | TheHill  The Hill
  4. WHO pledges urgent aid after Guinea health officials warn of new Ebola 'epidemic'  FRANCE 24 English
  5. The Africa Centres for Disease Control and Prevention Supports the Government of Republic of Guinea in the Fight against the new Ebola Virus Disease Outbreak in N'Zerekore Prefecture – Africa CDC  africacdc.org
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 几内亚宣布新的埃博拉疫情，西非最致命的疫情爆发5年后。
幾內亞宣佈新的埃博拉疫情，西非最致命的疫情爆發5年後。
